item.description:
FIELD TRIP!!! The Bad news, yes the Rocky Horror Picture Show is no longer in Harvard Square after almost 30 years The Good news - They are now at the AMC theatre on Boston Common! From their FB page: The Full Body Cast Boston Common Premiere Public Event · By Full Body Cast

Join us for our FIRST performance in our new home at Boston Common! We are coming back strong with some amazing new preshows and we are eager to reunite on the stage together again after a few weeks off.

Tickets are on sale NOW at www.fandango.com so hurry because we only have 300 seats for our debut in Boston Common!

 

http://www.facebook.com/events/421910357850065/
item.how_to_find_us: RHPS - The Full Body Cast Boston Common Premiere
item.name: Field Trip - RHPS
